description: TLSServerConfig defines VictoriaMetrics TLS configuration for the application's server

certFile.description: CertFile defines path to the pre-mounted file with certificate mutually exclusive with CertSecret

certSecret.description: CertSecretRef defines reference for secret with certificate content under given key mutually exclusive with CertFile

keyFile.description: KeyFile defines path to the pre-mounted file with certificate key mutually exclusive with KeySecretRef

keySecret.description: Key defines reference for secret with certificate key content under given key mutually exclusive with KeyFile
